kattabbaṃ.sutta_1: gamanīyo samparāyo, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ, caritabbaṃ brahmacariyaṃ.
kattabbaṃ.example_1: You must go to the next life. So you should do what is skillful, you should practice the spiritual life.

adhimucceyya.sutta_1: ākaṅkhamāno ca, bhante, bhagavā himavantaṃ pabbatarājaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ tveva adhimucceyya suvaṇṇañca panassā”ti.
adhimucceyya.example_1: If he wished, the Blessed One need only determine that the Himalaya, king of mountains, was gold, and it would turn into gold.”

sakkhiṃ.example_1: Why don’t you get too close to people?
